# Development Roadmap

## Phase 1: Foundation (Weeks 1-4)

### Sprint 1: Project Setup
- Initialize project structure
- Set up development environment
- Configure build tools and linters
- Set up CI/CD pipeline
- Create database schema
- Set up authentication foundation

### Sprint 2: Core Infrastructure
- Implement user authentication
- Set up database models
- Create API structure
- Implement error handling
- Set up logging and monitoring
- Create admin user system

## Phase 2: Product Catalog (Weeks 5-8)

### Sprint 3: Product Management
- Product CRUD operations
- Product image upload
- Category management
- Product search (basic)
- Product listing API

### Sprint 4: Product Display
- Product listing page (frontend)
- Product detail page
- Product image gallery
- Category browsing
- Basic filtering

## Phase 3: Shopping Experience (Weeks 9-12)

### Sprint 5: Shopping Cart
- Add to cart functionality
- Cart management API
- Cart persistence
- Cart calculations
- Cart UI components

### Sprint 6: Checkout Process
- Checkout flow implementation
- Shipping address management
- Order creation
- Order confirmation
- Order history

## Phase 4: Payment & Orders (Weeks 13-16)

### Sprint 7: Payment Integration
- Stripe integration
- Payment processing
- Payment webhooks
- Order status updates
- Payment error handling

### Sprint 8: Order Management
- Order tracking
- Order status management
- Admin order management
- Order notifications
- Invoice generation

## Phase 5: User Features (Weeks 17-20)

### Sprint 9: User Account
- User profile management
- Address book
- Password management
- Account settings
- User dashboard

### Sprint 10: Wishlist & Reviews
- Wishlist functionality
- Product reviews
- Rating system
- Review moderation
- Review display

## Phase 6: Admin Features (Weeks 21-24)

### Sprint 11: Admin Dashboard
- Admin dashboard UI
- User management
- Product management UI
- Order management UI
- Analytics dashboard

### Sprint 12: Advanced Admin
- Discount/coupon management
- Inventory management
- Reporting features
- Bulk operations
- Export functionality

## Phase 7: Optimization (Weeks 25-28)

### Sprint 13: Performance
- Image optimization
- Code splitting
- Caching implementation
- Database optimization
- API optimization

### Sprint 14: Search & Filtering
- Advanced search (Elasticsearch)
- Advanced filtering
- Search autocomplete
- Search analytics
- Search optimization

## Phase 8: Polish & Launch (Weeks 29-32)

### Sprint 15: Testing & QA
- Comprehensive testing
- Bug fixes
- Performance testing
- Security audit
- Accessibility audit

### Sprint 16: Documentation & Launch
- User documentation
- Admin documentation
- API documentation
- Deployment preparation
- Production launch

## Future Enhancements

### Phase 9: Advanced Features
- Multi-vendor support
- Subscription products
- Product recommendations
- Advanced analytics
- Mobile app

### Phase 10: Internationalization
- Multi-language support
- Multi-currency support
- Regional pricing
- Localized content
- International shipping
